dictionary inputTypes = {"f":"folder", "i":"input"}
 defines shortcuts for inputs
f:foldername uses a folder as input
i:inputName uses an input previously defined in the configuration file:
if it is no shortcut is present the input will be interpreted as direct input (full path to histogram)

Detailed Description

defines an input for a histogram : does not know anything about files
